Text.Text_En: Today, we have an important mission.

Text.Text_Ko: 크게 어려운 일은 아니야. 근처 숲에서 괴물이 나타났다는 신고가 들어왔어. 지나가는 사람들을 습격하고 있다더군.
Text.Text_En: It's nothing too difficult. There's been a report of a monster appearing in the nearby forest, attacking passersby.

Text.Text_Ko: 커다란 모기처럼 생겼다고 하는데... 날개를 퍼덕이며 아주 빠르게 움직인다고 해.
Text.Text_En: They say it looks like a giant mosquito... flapping its wings and moving very fast.

Item.Text_En: Time to show what I can do.
Even heroes deal with mosquito infestations?
